definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_temperature"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.15</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:is_in_cold_biome</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:is_in_cold_biome</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
